userOptionText:
Everybody has a plan for future

. Though future is uncertain and many times unpredictable, I believe that to some extent our future depends on our actions on past and present. In the future, I want to run a mega shopping mall business where my involvement would not be mandatory to run the daily business and

 I would enjoy my time by visiting different places of the world.

After I finished my graduation, I started working for a small company. Now I am working for a large multinational company I have planned to work till I become 36 and

 then I will take early retirement. The money I will inherit and the amount I am currently saving per month should allow me to start a business. I have planned to start a big shopping mall. I will have my close relatives as the employees and

 authorities of the business and initially I will work in this shopping mall for 2-3 years to make it run smoothly. When the business would go on with its own path, I will enjoy my vacation and would visit different renowned and beautiful cities of the world

. I will visit Asia, Europe, Russia and many more places.

Hopefully, I will enjoy the retirement and the trips. Though I am not sure about the future but

 I have already planned for it. Because I believe proper planning and initiation is

 the half of the total task and fulfilling dream. I have already taken some steps towards achieving my future plan

check_grammar_feedback.feedback_grammar: Don't put a space before the full stop

check_grammar_feedback.context: then I will take early retirement.
check_grammar_feedback.feedback_grammar: Put a comma after the introductory adverb phrase "Then".

check_grammar_feedback.context: authorities of the business and initially I will work in this shopping mall for 2-3 years to make it run smoothly.
check_grammar_feedback.feedback_grammar: This sentence does not start with an uppercase letter

check_grammar_feedback.context: When the business would go on with its own path, I will enjoy my vacation and would visit different renowned and beautiful cities of the world
check_grammar_feedback.feedback_grammar: Did you mean this? "in the world"? Use the preposition "in" for "cities".
Don't put a space before the full stop

check_grammar_feedback.context: Though I am not sure about the future but
check_grammar_feedback.feedback_grammar: "Though" at the beginning of a sentence usually requires a 2nd clause. Maybe a comma, question or exclamation mark is missing, or the sentence is incomplete and should be joined with the following sentence.

check_grammar_feedback.context: Because I believe proper planning and initiation is
check_grammar_feedback.feedback_grammar: The subject "planning and initiation" seems plural. Unless these 2 items are normally understood to be one unit, use a plural form of the verb: "are".

check_grammar_feedback.context: the half of the total task and fulfilling dream.
check_grammar_feedback.feedback_grammar: This sentence does not start with an uppercase letter
